dist/exercise/assets/scene/scene.js

scene.js

This file contains code all about the scene.

'use strict'; var sceneElement = document.getElementById('scene'); function Scene(sceneElement){ var sceneMethods = Object.create(null); var scene = {}; setBody(sceneElement); listenToRobots(); return sceneMethods; function setBody(sceneElement){ scene.element = sceneElement; scene.robots = sceneElement.getElementsByClassName('robot'); } function addRobot(){ } function getRobots(){ } function listenToRobots(){ _.each(scene.robots, listenToRobot); } function listenToRobot(robot){ robot.addEventListener('moved', checkRobot); } function checkRobot(moveEvent){ console.info('moved to', moveEvent.detail.position.x, moveEvent.detail.position.y); } }
